div.ab:
و
مــن على أرضك فوجدته
بقي عليك مال عظيم
وقد علمت الّذي حضر خصر حصر
من الزّمان وإنّما تقدّم
علي الآن ولعمري إن
عاملا من عمّال تأخّر
بعد الأجل الّذي أجّلته
أو تقدّم علي وقد ترك
خلفه من المال شيا
لأحمق مغتر هينة عليه
نفسه فإذآ جاك
كتبي هذا فاجمع ما على
أرضك من الجزية
پواپ والفضول ثم اقدم
علي بمال أرضك وبالّذين
أمرتك أن تقدم إلي بهم
من أهل أرضك فلعمري
لقد كنت أظن أن عملك
هو أنجح وخيرا ممّا
اپپ وقد فعلت ما لم
يفعل أحد من العمّال
في تأخير الّذي عليك وفی
عجزك في عملك وإنّه
واللّه ما لأحد عندي
أخّر هذا المال إلّا
ما قبح وجهه ولا يكونن
لما قبلك حبس وإيّاك
والعلل فإنّي لست
ممّن يصدّق بالعلل
لا يعذر بها والسّلم
على من اتّبع الهدى
وكتب خليفة يوم الاثنين

*** wa **** ḥisāb
min ʿalà ʾarḍi ka fa waǧadtu hu
baqiya ʿalay ka māl:un ʿaẓīm:un
wa qad ʿalimta ăllaḏī ḥaḍara ḥaṣira ḫaṣira
mina ăz zamāni wa ʾinnamā taqaddam
ʿalay ya ăl ʾāna wa la ʿamr ī ʾinna
ʿāmil:an min ʿummāl:in taʾaḫḫara
baʿda ăl ʾaǧali ăllaḏī ʾaǧǧaltu hu
ʾaw taqaddama ʿalay ya wa qad taraka
ḫalfa hu mina ăl māli šayʾ:an
la ʾaḥmaqu muġtarr:un hayyinaẗ:un ʿalay hi
nafsu hu fa ʾiḏā ǧāʾa ka
kitāb ī hāḏā fa ĭǧmaʿ mā ʿalà
ʾarḍi ka mina ăl ǧizyaẗi
wa ăl ʾabwābi wa ăl fuḍūli ṯumma ĭqdam
ʿalay ya bi māli ʾarḍi ka wa bi ăllaḏīna
ʾamartu ka ʾan taqdama ʾilay ya bi him
min ʾahli ʾarḍi ka fa la ʿamr ī
la qad kuntu ʾaẓunnu ʾanna ʿamala ka
huwa ʾanǧaḥu wa ḫayr:an mimmā
raʾaytu wa qad faʿalta mā lam
yafʿal ʾaḥad:un mina ăl ʿummāli
fī taʾḫīri ăllaḏī ʿalay ka wa fī
ʿaǧzi ka fī ʿamali ka wa ʾinna hu
wa ăl lāhi mā li ʾaḥad:in ʿind ī
ʾaḫḫara hāḏā ăl māla ʾillā
mā qabuḥa waǧhu hu wa lā yakūnanna
li mā qibala ka ḥabs:un wa ʾiyyā ka
wa ăl ʿilala fa ʾinn ī lastu
mimman yuṣaddiqu bi ăl ʿilali
wa lā yaʿḏiru bi hā wa ăs salāmu
ʿalà mani ĭttabaʿa ăl hudà
wa kataba ḫalīfaẗu yawma ăli ĭṯnayni

.... and .... [das, was ...] und [was ...]
Dein Gebiet schul[det], so daß ich von ihm festgestellt habe, daß from your land, and I have found it.
es von Dir noch aussteht, ist eine große Steuerschuld. You still owe a large amount of revenue.
You well know what time it has come to be;
so appear
before me now. By my life, if
any finance officer delays ... Ein Beamter, welcher ...
beyond the term which I appointed,
or appears before me having left
behind him aught of the revenue,
ist fürwahr dumm ... truly, he is but a self-deceiving fool who has light regard for
his life. So when there has come to you
this my letter, collect what is due from
your land of gold tax and
imposts and extraordinary taxes. Then come
to me with the revenue of your land, together with those
whom I had ordered you to bring with you
of the people of your land. Now, by my life,
I really used to think your administration
more successful and better than what
I have seen. For you have indeed done what not
one of the finance officers has done
in the delaying of what is due from you and in
the incompetence of your administration. For indeed,
by God, there is in my service not one Jeder bei mir, der ...
who has delayed this revenue
erhält eine entehrende Strafe. ... without being disgraced. Let there be no
withholding of what is with you. And beware
of excuses, for I am not
of those who believe in excuses
or accept them. Peace
be with those who follow the guidance.
Written by Khalīfah on Monday.
